item.title: Project IV: IT Service Management - A Data Science Use Case
Project II: Price Valuation and the Prediction of Diamonds
Project III: Natural Language Processing Text Classification
item.description: Highlights Web scraped data from Yelp.com using Selenium and Beautiful Soup to retrieve 10,000+ rows of restaurant data Conducted descriptive and exploratory analytics to determine best course of action Developed complex preprocessing pipelines for textual review data such as PorterStemmer, tokenization, and vectorization Evaluated Logistic Regression and TFIDFVectorizer model performance for number of features and bi-grams vs tri-grams Used Latent Semantic Analysis to discover significant topic areas for both positive and negative sentiment
